review: Works well. We have Smart TVs, but advantage to the Amazon Fire TV Stick is that it can be moved among several TVs, including Smart TVs. Apps more updated than those fixed in Smart TVs.  REDUCED CABLE TO BASIC using Amazon Fire TV, Netflix & Sling TV and monthly TV bill has dropped from nearly $200 monthly to about $60. Yes, it is possible. Internet cost is separate. We don't miss paying for a 300-channel tier *required* by the cable service provider, in order to get the dozen or so channels that I **actually watch on a regular basis**.  Sling is LIVE streaming and the Amazon Fire TV Stick makes that possible.  Photo is the Fire Stick TV menu, as it appears on screen.  This is a Smart TV, where we opted to use the Fire Stick to access the Sling TV app.
author: Goldenmom "kdj"
